pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - GreenPalace Hotel Resort GreenPalace HOME ABOUT US Casino CONTACT Privacy Policy Introduction: At GreenPalace Hotel Resort, we are ardently committed to safeguarding your privacy. This Privacy Policy delineates the modalities of data collection, processing, and utilization pertaining to the information acquired from users of our website. Information Collection: We may solicit and collect personally identifiable information, including but not limited to names, contact details, and demographic data, which is provided voluntarily by users through various channels, such as reservation forms and subscription services. Data Usage: The information garnered is utilized to enhance user experience, tailor services, and fulfill requests. It may also be employed to disseminate promotional content and updates about our resort, subject to usersâ€™ consent. Data Protection: We implement stringent security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, or misuse. However, despite our best efforts, no data transmission over the internet or electronic storage can be guaranteed to be 100% secure. Third-Party Disclosure: We do not disseminate, sell, or trade personal data to third parties without prior consent, except where required by law or to facilitate essential services on our behalf. Cookies: Our website employs cookies to enhance functionality and user experience. Cookies are small data files that are placed on your device to track preferences and activities. Users may configure their browsers to reject cookies, although this may impact the functionality of certain features. Amendments: We reserve the prerogative to amend this Privacy Policy periodically. Any modifications will be reflected on this page and will be effective immediately upon posting. Contact: For any inquiries or concerns regarding our Privacy Policy, please contact us . pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions - GreenPalace Hotel Resort GreenPalace HOME ABOUT US Casino CONTACT Terms and Conditions Introduction: Welcome to GreenPalace Hotel Resort. By accessing or using our website and services, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following Terms and Conditions. Please read these terms carefully before using our services. Reservation Policy: All reservations are subject to availability and confirmation. A valid credit card is required to guarantee your booking. Cancellations or modifications must be made within the stipulated time frame to avoid any penalties or charges. Payment Terms: Payment for services rendered must be made upon check-in or check-out, unless otherwise specified. We accept various forms of payment including credit cards, debit cards, and cash. Any additional charges incurred during your stay must be settled before departure. Cancellation Policy: Cancellations or modifications made outside the allowed period may incur a cancellation fee or a charge equivalent to one night's stay. Please refer to the specific cancellation terms provided at the time of booking. Use of Website: You agree to use our website for lawful purposes only and in a manner that does not infringe upon the rights of others or restrict their use and enjoyment of the site. Any misuse of the website may result in suspension or termination of access. Intellectual Property: All content on our website, including but not limited to text, images, logos, and trademarks, are the property of GreenPalace Hotel Resort or its licensors and are protected by intellectual property laws. Unauthorized use or reproduction of such content is prohibited. Limitation of Liability: GreenPalace Hotel Resort shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of or in connection with your use of our website or services, including but not limited to loss of data, loss of revenue, or interruption of service. Amendments: We reserve the right to amend these Terms and Conditions at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and your continued use of our website and services following such changes constitutes your acceptance of the revised terms. Governing Law: These Terms and Conditions shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India]. Any disputes arising from or related to these terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in India].
